meanings.definition: The state or quality of being proud.
meanings.sent1: Her proudnesses shone through when she received the award.
meanings.sent2: His proudnesses were evident in the way he stood tall after winning the race.
meanings.sent3: The cat's proudnesses at catching the mouse was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The tree's branches swayed with proudnesses in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The child's eyes sparkled with proudnesses as she showed her drawing to her parents.

meanings.definition: Feelings of satisfaction or pleasure in one's own achievements or qualities.
meanings.sent1: The artist's proudnesses were reflected in every stroke of the brush.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't hide her proudnesses when she aced the test.
meanings.sent3: The dog's proudnesses at learning a new trick made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The sun beamed down with proudnesses on the blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: His voice was filled with proudnesses as he talked about his successful business.
